" * OCTranspo Bus App

 * Movie Finder App
 @Author Weiping Guo
 Version 1.0
 * Soccer games App
"
Sorry, we cannot find this movie.
Do you want to add it?
View more details or delete it?

" 1-Enter a movie title
 2-Click on SEARCH button to get results
 3-Click on ADD icon to save the results
 4-Click on CLEAR icon to clear all the results
 5-Click on SAVED icon to see the saved list
 6-Click on the saved item to view more details or delete
 7-Click More Details to view more details
 8-Click Delete to remove from the saved list
 Created by Weiping Guo"
